channel.title: Comments on: Help A School Library, Donate Books NOW!

item.title: By: samrawit
item.dc:creator: samrawit
item.description:
Hi World Our school is not Financially administered by local, state or national governments; thus, we are funded in whole or in part by charging our students tuition, endowment, donation and individuals help.
our school deserve Educational charties,donors,school fundraisers and organizations inorder to build a Library. Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hi World
Our school is not Financially administered by local, state or national governments;
thus, we are funded in whole or in part by
charging our students tuition, endowment, donation and individuals help.

our school deserve Educational charties,donors,school fundraisers and organizations inorder to build a Library.
Thanks

item.title: By: Anna Mukoda
item.dc:creator: Anna Mukoda
item.description:
Greetings
Our institute is non profit making looking after orphans in rural western part of Uganda. Due to our status, we are unable to purchase all education materials needed at the school and we are therefore looking for organizations which can donate books usable in our syllabus. We mostly need used or new books listed below;
1) A-LEVEL CHEMISTRY BY RAMSDEN 07487-5299-4 Nelsonthornes Publishers Uk 300 Copies
2) UNDERSTANDING BIOLOGY BY TOOLE 07487-3957-2 Nelsonthornes Publishers Uk 300 Copies 3) Oxford dictionaries latest edition
Sr. Anna Mukoda Principal
item.content:encoded:
Greetings

Our institute is non profit making looking after orphans in rural western part of Uganda. Due to our status, we are unable to purchase all education materials needed at the school and we are therefore looking for organizations which can donate books usable in our syllabus. We mostly need used or new books listed below;

1) A-LEVEL CHEMISTRY
BY RAMSDEN
07487-5299-4
Nelsonthornes Publishers Uk
300 Copies

2) UNDERSTANDING BIOLOGY
BY TOOLE
07487-3957-2
Nelsonthornes Publishers Uk
300 Copies
3) Oxford dictionaries latest edition

Sr. Anna Mukoda
Principal

item.title: By: Jaime Moore
item.dc:creator: Jaime Moore
item.description: Thanks Russell! Also, feel free to pick books that are not on the wishlist. I have a lot more books that I would like to add, but I don't always get the chance to add them to the wishlist.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Russell! Also, feel free to pick books that are not on the wishlist. I have a lot more books that I would like to add, but I don’t always get the chance to add them to the wishlist.
